name: Fling D'Block
description:
Beware the Obstacles as you Fling D’Block!

Fling D'Block, is a Physics-Based Precision Time Trial/Speedrunner. Fling and bounce your block across a multitude of treacherous levels in the fastest time collecting as you go along while trying not to make a fatal mistake. This is a game of speed and dexterity, challenging you to use all your skills to optimally navigate each level collecting crystals, avoiding perilous obstacles and then racing to the exit as quickly as possible.

And whatever you do… Go as Fast as You Can!

Traverse

Fling and bounce across perilous levels as you learn to master movement over time and dedication.


Avoid

Spikes, Death Wheels, Spiked Pendulums, Auto-Tracking Turrets, and Spinning Lasers. There are dangers all around you so be careful where you fling.


Create

Fling D’Block comes with a built-in level editor for those of you that wish to create fun, exciting and challenging custom levels.
